name: Range.setStartBefore
description: The Range.setStartBefore() method sets the start position of a Range relative to another Node. The parent Node of the start of the Range will be the same as that for the referenceNode.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Traversal and Range Specification
